description: Master index for ethereum.org AI agent context. This is the entry point for all agent consumption. It references other schema files and provides high-level project orientation.

schemas.description: References to specialized context schema files. Agents should load only schemas relevant to their current task.

navigationSchema.description: Schema describing site navigation structure, routes, and link architecture.

dataBible.description: Schema describing content types, data models, and frontmatter structures.

designSystem.description: Schema describing CSS variables, UI tokens, and visual design patterns.

techStack.description: Core technologies used in the ethereum.org website. Agents should reference these when generating or modifying code.

framework.name: Next.js
framework.description: React-based framework providing SSG/SSR, routing, and build optimization.

language.name: TypeScript
language.description: Primary language for all source code. Strict type checking enforced.

uiLibrary.name: Chakra UI
uiLibrary.description: Component library providing accessible, themeable UI primitives.

projectStructure.description: Key directory paths in the ethereum.org repository. All paths are relative to project root with forward slashes.

src.description: Main source code directory containing components, lib, and utilities.

app.description: Next.js App Router directory defining routes and page layouts.

publicContent.description: Markdown content files organized by locale and topic.

lib.description: Shared library code including navigation, utils, and data fetching.
